content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** penguin tutorial 1 ** we re crafting something super lovable a little penguin if you re a fan of penguins amigurumi or just love all things cute this tutorial is perfect for you join us as we guide you through the entire process of making this charming little penguin from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own lovable penguin in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn of 2 shades darker and lighter in any color and white possible to use scrap yarn * small amount of yarn in yellow * 6 or 7mm safety eyes or black yarn to sew the eyes * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch marker * small amount of stuffing for your penguin to be the same size as mine please use any type of yarn that will fit well on a size 5 3mm hook in this tutorial you ll learn * the materials you ll need to get started * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * tips and tricks to make crochet more enjoyable ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that makes a great gift or keepsake 1 https //youtu be/rfoie-pitpq
